content: Filter VC 300-X dry ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Accessories for dust and water management > Filters for vacuums and air cleaners- - - ### FEATURES:Applications Suitable for dry applications only Maintenance tips: the filter is best cleaned using the vacuum cleaners internal filter cleaning mechanism (manual or automatic). Block the hose with your hand to increase the cleaning effect. Do not attempt to clean the filter by hitting it or using pressurized air. These actions may damage the filter. Avoid bending the filter. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Filters For use with: VC 300-17X Filter material: Paper Technical Data | Accessory type | Filters | For use with | VC 300-17X | Filter material | Paper | Filter type | Dry | Filter efficiency | 99.9% filter efficiency ### ITEMS- 2177885 - Filter VC 300-X dry - Package Size 1 pc
